newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Costello says rate cut working through.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Costello says rate cut working through.

text.p: Australian Treasurer Peter Costello said on Friday that Australia's recent interest rate cut was still working its way through the economic system.
He also said the government believes it can improve Australia's interest rate regime.
"I do think that the interest rate regime, which in real terms has been high, has been a terrible burden on manufacture and I think we can improve that," Costello said.
On the July 31 official interest rate cut to 7.0 percent from 7.50 percent, he said: "We've still got to have the interest rate reduction work its way through the system."
